noInventoryHint.title: Hint!
noInventoryHint.body: Your inventory is empty click on + add merch to add items to your inventory

mediaHint.title: Hint!
mediaHint.body: Click on social media icon to edit details.

noMediaHint.title: Hint!
noMediaHint.body: Click on + add social media to add your socials.

merchShowHint.title: Hint!
merchShowHint.body: Click on inventory items to edit details.

merchHideHint.title: Hint!
merchHideHint.body: Click on show inventory to view inventory. Then you can click on inventory items and edit them.
